overview: David was the owner and Editor in Chief of Equities Magazine. He acquired Equities Magazine approximately six years ago and built it into the premiere magazine covering small and mid-cap companies. During his tenure Equities Magazine evolved dramatically in quality, size and circulation, while its’ Conference Division grew as well, attracting hundreds of companies to present, and thousands of industry professionals and self-directed investors to attend the always packed events. His position at the magazine opened doors for him at the top of the financial community, providing him unique access to CEOs of hundreds of companies and financial firms. At EQUITIES, David will incorporate all of these exceptional relationships, to ensure the extraordinary depth and magnitude of the Company.
